source: 明日の会議、資料を準備しておきます
seed: I'll prepare the materials for tomorrow's meeting.

casual_25.new_translation: I'm preparing the materials for tomorrow's meeting.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 明日会議の資料を準備しています。

casual_50.new_translation: I'm getting the materials ready for tomorrow's meeting.
casual_50.reverse_translation: 明日会議の資料を準備してる

casual_75.new_translation: I'm prepping the materials for tomorrow's meet.
casual_75.reverse_translation: 明日会議の資料を準備してる

casual_100.new_translation: I'm gettin' the materials ready for tomorrow's meet.
casual_100.reverse_translation: 明日会の資料を準備してる。

polite_25.new_translation: I will prepare the materials for tomorrow's meeting.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 明日会議の資料を準備します。

polite_50.new_translation: I shall prepare the materials for tomorrow's meeting.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 明日会議の資料を準備いたします.

polite_75.new_translation: I will prepare the materials for tomorrow's meeting.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 明日会議の資料を準備します。

polite_100.new_translation: I shall prepare the materials for tomorrow's meeting.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 明日会議の資料を準備いたします。

business_25.new_translation: I will prepare the materials for tomorrow's meeting.
business_25.reverse_translation: 明日会議の資料を準備します。

business_50.new_translation: I am preparing the materials for tomorrow's meeting.
business_50.reverse_translation: 明日会議の資料を準備しています。

business_75.new_translation: I am in the process of preparing the materials for tomorrow's meeting.
business_75.reverse_translation: 明日会議の資料を準備しているところです

business_100.new_translation: I am presently engaged in the preparation of materials for the meeting scheduled for tomorrow.
business_100.reverse_translation: 現在、明日の会議のための資料の準備をしているところです。

source: この映画、思ったより面白かった
seed: This movie was more interesting than I thought.

casual_25.reverse_translation: この映画、結構面白かった

casual_50.reverse_translation: この映画はとても面白かった。

casual_75.reverse_translation: この映画は本当に衝撃的だった

casual_100.reverse_translation: この映画は全く素晴らしかった！

polite_25.new_translation: I found this movie to be more interesting than I had anticipated.
polite_25.reverse_translation: この映画は思っていたよりもっと面白かったです。

polite_50.new_translation: I found this movie to be more intriguing than I had initially anticipated.
polite_50.reverse_translation: この映画は思っていたよりもっと面白かったです

polite_75.new_translation: I discovered that this film possessed a greater level of interest than my initial expectations.
polite_75.reverse_translation: この映画は最初の期待よりもっと面白いと思った

polite_100.new_translation: It has come to my attention that the film in question exhibits a considerably heightened level of fascination, surpassing my preliminary anticipations.
polite_100.reverse_translation: この映画は、私の最初の期待を上回る興味深い映画であることがわかりました.

business_25.new_translation: This movie was more interesting than I had anticipated.
business_25.reverse_translation: この映画、思ったより面白かった

business_50.new_translation: The movie was more engaging than I had initially expected.
business_50.reverse_translation: 映画は思っていたよりもっと面白かったです。

business_75.new_translation: The movie proved to be more engaging than my initial expectations.
business_75.reverse_translation: 映画は私の最初の予想よりもっと面白かった

business_100.new_translation: The cinematic production demonstrated a heightened level of engagement that surpassed my preliminary anticipations.
business_100.reverse_translation: 映画の制作は、私の最初の期待を上回る高いレベルのエンゲージメントを示した。

source: 来週の金曜日、空いていますか？

casual_25.reverse_translation: 来週の金曜日、空いていますか？

casual_50.new_translation: Do you have anything going on next Friday?
casual_50.reverse_translation: 来週の金曜日は予定ある？

casual_75.reverse_translation: 来週の金曜日、予定ある？

casual_100.new_translation: Do you have any plans for next Friday?
casual_100.reverse_translation: 来週の金曜日予定ある？

polite_25.new_translation: Will you be available next Friday?
polite_25.reverse_translation: 来週金曜日は予定が空いていますか？

polite_50.new_translation: Will you be available next Friday?
polite_50.reverse_translation: 来週の金曜日はご都合いかがですか？

polite_75.new_translation: Will you be available next Friday?
polite_75.reverse_translation: 来週の金曜日はご都合いかがですか？

polite_100.new_translation: Would you be available next Friday?
polite_100.reverse_translation: 来週の金曜日はご都合いかがですか？

business_25.new_translation: Will you be available next Friday?
business_25.reverse_translation: 来週の金曜日はご都合いかがですか？

business_50.reverse_translation: 来週の金曜日はご予定が入っていませんか？

business_75.new_translation: Will you be available next Friday?
business_75.reverse_translation: 来週の金曜日はご都合いかがですか？

business_100.new_translation: Will you be available next Friday?
business_100.reverse_translation: 来週の金曜日はご都合いかがですか？

source: 最近忙しくて、なかなか運動できていない
seed: I've been busy lately and haven't been able to exercise much.

casual_25.new_translation: Lately, I've been pretty hectic and haven't had much chance to work out
casual_25.reverse_translation: 最近忙しくて、あまり運動する機会がなかった

casual_50.new_translation: Lately, I've been super busy and haven't had a lot of time to exercise
casual_50.reverse_translation: 最近、かなり忙しくて、あまり運動する時間がなかった

casual_75.new_translation: Lately, I've been crazy busy and barely have any time to work out
casual_75.reverse_translation: 最近、めっちゃ忙しくて、運動する時間がない

casual_100.new_translation: Lately, I've been super duper busy and hardly got any time to hit the gym
casual_100.reverse_translation: 最近、めっちゃ忙しくて、ほとんどジムに行く時間がない

polite_25.new_translation: I've been quite busy lately and haven't managed to exercise as much as I'd like.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 最近、かなり忙しくて、あまり運動できておりません。

polite_50.new_translation: I have been rather busy of late and have not succeeded in exercising to the extent that I would have liked.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 最近、かなり忙しくて、思うように運動できていない。

polite_75.new_translation: I have been quite occupied recently and, regrettably, have not managed to engage in as much physical activity as I had hoped.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 最近、かなり忙しくて、残念ながら思うように運動できていません。

polite_100.new_translation: I have been exceedingly preoccupied of late and, to my regret, have not succeeded in partaking in as much physical activity as I had aspired to.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 最近、非常に忙しくしており、残念ながら、希望していたほどの身体活動を行うことができておりません。

business_25.new_translation: I have been quite busy lately and haven't been able to exercise much.
business_25.reverse_translation: 最近忙しくて、なかなか運動できていない

business_50.new_translation: I have been rather busy of late and consequently have not had much opportunity to exercise.
business_50.reverse_translation: 最近かなり忙しくて、あまり運動する機会がありませんでした。

business_75.new_translation: I have been quite occupied recently and, as a result, have not had the opportunity to engage in physical activity to a great extent.
business_75.reverse_translation: 最近、かなり忙しくて、あまり運動する機会がありませんでした。

business_100.new_translation: I have been considerably preoccupied of late and, consequently, have not had the opportunity to engage in physical activity to any significant extent.
business_100.reverse_translation: 最近かなり忙しくしており、その結果として、十分な運動をする機会を持てておりません。

source: お土産買ってきたから、よかったらどうぞ
seed: I brought some souvenirs, so feel free to take one if you'd like

casual_25.new_translation: I picked up a souvenir for you, feel free to take it if you'd like
casual_25.reverse_translation: あなたへのお土産を買ったので、よかったら持っていってね

casual_50.new_translation: I grabbed a little something for you, take it if you're into it
casual_50.reverse_translation: ちょっとしたものを買ってきたので、よかったら持っていってね

casual_75.new_translation: I picked up a little something just for you, snag it if you're feelin' it
casual_75.reverse_translation: ちょっとしたものをあなたのためにお土産に買ったんだ。よかったら持っていってね

casual_100.new_translation: I got a sweet little something just for you, grab it if you're into it
casual_100.reverse_translation: ちょっとしたものをあなたのために買ったので、気に入ったら持っていって

polite_25.new_translation: I brought some souvenirs, would you like them?
polite_25.reverse_translation: お土産買ってきたから、よかったらどうぞ

polite_50.new_translation: I have brought some souvenirs; would you care to have them?
polite_50.reverse_translation: お土産を買ってきましたが、よかったらどうですか

polite_75.new_translation: I have brought some souvenirs; would you be so kind as to accept them?
polite_75.reverse_translation: お土産を買ってきました。よろしければお受け取りいただけますか？

polite_100.new_translation: I have taken the liberty of bringing some souvenirs; would you be so gracious as to accept them?
polite_100.reverse_translation: 土産物をいくつか持ってきましたが、よろしければお受け取りいただけますでしょうか？

business_25.new_translation: I've brought some souvenirs; would you like to take them?
business_25.reverse_translation: お土産をいくつか持ってきましたが、受け取っていただけますか？

business_50.new_translation: I have brought some souvenirs and I would be happy for you to accept them.
business_50.reverse_translation: お土産を買ってきましたので、ぜひ受け取っていただければと思います。

business_75.new_translation: I have brought some souvenirs and would be delighted if you would accept them.
business_75.reverse_translation: お土産をいくつか持ってきましたので、もしよろしければお受け取りいただければ幸いです。

business_100.new_translation: I have procured certain mementos and would be most appreciative if you would graciously accept them.
business_100.reverse_translation: 私は、いくつかの記念品を購入しましたので、もしよろしければお受け取りいただければ幸いです。
